task.title: Resetting the Origin
task.shortdesc: You can reset the origin when you want the to process all available data. You can reset the origin for Directory origins. Reset the origin when the pipeline is not running.

context.p: pipelinesresetting the originFor the Directory origin, the notes where it stopped processing data when you stop a pipeline. When you restart the pipeline, it continues from where it left off by default.
When you want the to process all available data instead of continuing from where it stopped, reset the origin.
To change the starting point for a Kafka Consumer, you need to change the offset in the Kafka ZooKeeper. For details, see the Kafka documentation.

step.cmd: To reset the origin, click the More icon ().
In the Reset Origin Confirmation dialog box, click Yes to reset the origin.
